uk.gov.gchq.koryphe.serialisation.json

Class SimpleClassNameIdResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.koryphe.serialisation.json.SimpleClassNameIdResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsontype.TypeIdResolver

    public class SimpleClassNameIdResolver
extends Object
implements com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsontype.TypeIdResolver

    A SimpleClassNameIdResolver is a TypeIdResolver that allows simple class names to be used as type ids, rather than needing to provide the entire class name.

    If 2 classes are discovered to have the same simple class name then a useful exception is thrown telling the user to choose which class they want and use the full class name.

    See Also:
    SimpleClassNameCache

      • getSimpleClassName

        public static String getSimpleClassName(Class<?> clazz)
        Gets a simple class name for the given class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to get the simple class name for.
        Returns:
        the simple class name or the full class name if the clazz is unknown or a conflict is found.

      • getSimpleClassNameOrNull

        public static String getSimpleClassNameOrNull(Class<?> clazz)
        Gets a simple class name for the given class. If a conflict is found or the simple class name is unknown then null is returned.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to get the simple class name for.
        Returns:
        the simple class name, or null a simple class name can't be used.

      • getClassName

        public static String getClassName(String id)
        Gets the class name for a given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the simple class name or full class name.
        Returns:
        the full class name or the original id if one could not be found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there are multiple classes with the same id.

      • getClassName

        public static String getClassName(String id,
                                  com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JavaType baseType)
        Gets the class name for a given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the simple class name or full class name.
        baseType - the base type of the ID - used to help resolve conflicting IDs
        Returns:
        the full class name or the original id if one could not be found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there are multiple classes with the same id.
